meanings.definition: relating to or forming the socket of the hip joint
meanings.sent1: The acetabular socket provides stability to the hip joint.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon examined the acetabular structure during the hip replacement surgery.
meanings.sent3: The acetabular socket decided to throw a party for the hip joint.
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to fitness was as strong as the acetabular bond in the hip joint.
meanings.sent5: The acetabular shape of the socket ensures smooth movement in the hip joint.

meanings.definition: shaped like a cup or saucer
meanings.sent1: The flower had an acetabular appearance, resembling a tiny cup.
meanings.sent2: She collected antique dishes with unique acetabular designs.
meanings.sent3: The acetabular cup giggled as it held the tea.
meanings.sent4: The moon rested in the acetabular sky, like a saucer holding a star.
meanings.sent5: The acetabular shape of the seashell was perfect for collecting tiny treasures.
